sourcesContent:
Welcome to Our Accessible Website

Key Features

Accessible Navigation

Fully keyboard-accessible navigation with ARIA labels and skip links.

Semantic HTML

Properly structured content using semantic HTML elements.

Get Started

Skip to main content

Outdoor Gear Shop

Explore the great outdoors

High quality gear for your next adventure.

Our Products

{{ p.name }}

\${{ p.price }}

© 2025 Outdoor Gear Shop

import { Component, OnInit, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private router: Router) { } ngOnInit() { } navigateToProducts(): void { this.router.navigate(['/products']); } products = [ { id: 1, name: 'Mountain Bike', price: 299.99, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x400/?mountain,bike', alt: 'Red mountain bike on trail' }, { id: 2, name: 'Camping Tent', price: 149.99, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x400/?camping,tent', alt: 'Green camping tent pitched in woods' }, { id: 3, name: 'Hiking Boots', price: 89.99, img: 'https://source.unsplash.com/600x400/?hiking,boots', alt: 'Pair of hiking boots on rock' } ]; // smooth scroll to products section scrollToProducts() { const el = document.getElementById('products'); el?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } // track keyboard for focus outlines isKeyboard = false; @HostListener('window:keydown.tab') onKeyDown() { this.isKeyboard = true; } @HostListener('window:mousedown') onMouseDown() { this.isKeyboard = false; } }
